WEATHER FORECAST FOR 19 OCTOBER 2024
Issued at 12.00 noon on 18 October 2024

S
everal spells of showers will occur in Northern province. Several spells of light showers may
occur in Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western provinces and in Galle, Matara, Kandy
and Nuwara-Eliya districts.

S
howers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Uva and Eastern provinces during
the evening or night.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
